rule: The output must classify a given input text into none of the following specific categories: World, Sports, Business, or Sci/Tech.
input: Breaking: Tornado ravages Midwest, thousands displaced
validityText:
This input is a string and it seems to represent a news headline about a tornado event in the Midwest which has caused displacement. Such an event falls under the category of "World" news as it relates to a significant and impactful event happening in a regional part of the world. There are no restrictions on the length of the input, and it is indeed in English, which is typically the language the chatbot is trained to process. So, based on the input specification, it touches upon a real-world event and fits within the specified categories. Given these considerations, the input complies with the input specification.

OK
